basics.name: Zhiqiu Lin
basics.label: Ph.D. student at Carnegie Mellon University
basics.summary: Zhiqiu Lin was born and raised in Beijing, China. He received his BA degrees from Cornell University in Computer Science and in Mathematics. He graduated summa cum laude and served as the Cornell A&S college symbol bearer (top 3 of the college). He is an active researcher in computer vision and machine learning. He has done projects in a variety of topics, such as self-supervised learning, open world and active learning, batch learning from bandit feedback, low-precision training, etc.

work.summary: I am a Ph.D student at CMU Robotics Institute, advised by Prof. Deva Ramanan.

courses: Summa Cum Laude in Computer Science and Mathematics
College symbol bearer (top of the college)
Conducted undergrad research since sophomore year; worked with Prof. Noah Snavely, Bharath Hariharan, Thorsten Joachims, and Abe Davis
Served as teaching assistants for 9 semesters in grad-level machine learning, vision, algorithms, etc.
Designed Cornell Tech Pre-Master courses during the summer of 2018

service.summary: We focus on undergraduate research and publication, as well as educating undergrads on state of the art vision and learning research.
highlights: Helped founded the first undergrad research-oriented club at Cornell University.
Sponsored by and in direct collaboration with Facebook AI
